name: AC-CENT PLUS® SANDED
description: AC-CENT® PLUS Sanded Grout is a scientifically advanced polymer modified Portland cement based colores grout. Ac-cent’s unique blend of Portland cement, specially graded silica filters, powdered latex modifiers and color fast pigments provides for a superior grout with excellent flexural and bond strength, color control, minimal efflorescence and high compressive strength. Protected with AMT (Anti-Microbial Technology), it resists bacteria, mold and fongus, and associated bacterial stains.
